aka: El Ascenso de los Nazis(西班牙)
Rise of the Nazis: Dictators at War

cast.name: 凯特·弗利特伍德 Kate Fleetwood

trans_title: 纳粹的崛起 第二季
El Ascenso de los Nazis(西班牙)
Rise of the Nazis: Dictators at War
introduction: (Rise of the Nazis Series 2) In 1940, Hitler’s plan for world domination appeared to be gaining momentum. Countries fell and enemies were vanquished with ease. But his decision to open an Eastern Front and attack Russia was the beginning of the end for the Nazis and the war. This innovative history series looks at the reasons why Germany’s plans were changed and the disastrous consequences of their actions.Episode 1 | Barbarossa1/3 At the peak of his power, Hitler now faces fellow ruthless dictator Stalin.Episode 2 | Stalingrad2/3 The Nazis have lost in Moscow, and both dictators take charge of their armies.Episode 3 | The Home Front3/3 The resistance gets a student voice, and an enemy within plots to kill Hitler.PRODUCTION COMPANY: 72 Films
chinese_title: 纳粹的崛起 第二季
